title: An Act making changes to certain references in the banking laws of the Commonwealth

abstracts.abstract: By Representative Lawn of Watertown, a petition (accompanied by bill, House, No. 1232) of John J. Lawn, Jr., for legislation to make changes to certain references in banking laws.  Financial Services.

actions.description: Referred to the committee on Financial Services
